bug.author: JavaFXpert
bug.summary: Error when attempting to visualize network using model.setListeners(new HistogramIterationListener(1))
bug.description: When attempting to visualize a network using the following method of MultiLayerNetwork: setListeners(new HistogramIterationListener(1)) I receive the following error: o.d.e.f.m.MLPMnistSingleLayerExample - Build model.... /Users/jamesweaver/dl4j-0.4-examples/target/classes/dropwizard.yml has an error: Unrecognized field at: template Did you mean?: server metrics uploadPath logging Removing the template and defaultName lines from dropwizard.yml resulted in successfully launching the visualization.

comments.comment: This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
